title: 820-3662 Fails "Sensor Group Test 7" in ASD?
message:
I've got an 820-3662 board that seems to work fine, but it fails the "Sensor Group Test #7" on ASD, but it doesn't give any indication of which sensor fails. I know there are several it checks, but is there a way to narrow down which sensor exactly has failed?

Thanks in advance!

title: 820-3662 Fails "Sensor Group Test 7" in ASD?
message: Also, somewhat related; I haven't had a chance to work on any 2015 model MBPr 15" machines yet; is the 820-3662 compatible/interchangeable with the 820-00138 (I think that's the 2015 15" board model) board? I had a customer ask, and I'm not entirely certain. I know the 2015 models had some sort of LCD identifier information in the LCD assembly or something, correct? I want to make sure I don't mis-inform them.

title: 820-3662 Fails "Sensor Group Test 7" in ASD?
message: Run EFI version of ASD to get the truth, not OS

title: 820-3662 Fails "Sensor Group Test 7" in ASD?
message: Thanks, Louis. I'll do that and see what's up--thanks.
